issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Buttons '+' and '-' do not function as expected on Base UI> Views> Scroll views> "Scrolling Zoom+Pinch" page.

Steps:
1.In "Scrolling Zoom+Pinch" page press on "+" and "-" buttons on the top right side of the page.

Expected results:
The image should scale appropriately.

Actual results:
Image do not responds to buttons actions.

Note:
This is not a regression. It acures on 2.1.1 as well on all tested devices.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Buttons  '+'  and  '-'  do not function as expected in "Scrolling Zoom+Pinch" page
fields.environment:
Tested on :
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208192014
Titanium SDK 2.1.1 GA 
Titanium SDK 2.1.2.v20120816171609
Devices:
iPhone 4 version 4.3.5
iPad 3 version 5.1.
iPhone 4S version 6 beta 4

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
